---
sidebar_label: Grey Wolf Optimization (GWO)
---

## Grey Wolf Optimization (GWO)

Grey Wolf Optimization mimics leadership hierarchy and hunting behavior of grey wolves, balancing exploration and exploitation using alpha/beta/delta roles.

### Key points
- Encircling, hunting, attacking/diverging phases
- Few control parameters, simple implementation

### Pros / Cons
- Pros: simple, effective in many applications
- Cons: may require hybridization for high-dim problems
